text: my friends and i visited this dennys restaurant around 1130 pm everything seemed fine and the waiter was very friendly although i didnt eat anything my friends did and unfortunately they fell ill afterward
meeting at this location is a preference for my family but i have not once had a meal that pleased me here the service was adequate but i never depart feeling fully satisfied

to put it simply this particular kind of asian food exhibits a salty flavor profile with sauces and meat that can often taste like they come from a can its comparable to frozen meals available at supermarkets but comes with a higher price tag

our experience was tarnished by the inadequate service provided by one of the female staff members additionally the restaurant offered a scarce selection of food options the taste of the dishes was unimpressive and did not live up to our expectations given the subpar service and food quality the price seemed unjustified however i must admit that i found satisfaction in the cleanliness of the establishment
while i found the crab legs and shrimp to be enjoyable they did not rise to the same level of excellence as the cosmopolitian

my affection for this establishment knows no bounds it would be a dream come true if they had locations in california i never fail to visit when im in arizona at least 23 times the food is consistently spectacular the venue is always spotless and the staff are incredibly amazing and kindhearted

one of the female staff members had a poor attitude towards us and there were limited options for dining the taste of the food was just average and considering the service and quality the price seemed unjustified however i must admit that i was content with the cleanliness of everything
not worth going to poor customer service and crappy thin pizza just keep driving on by
we dont really prefer dryaged meats they tend to taste spoiled to us however the sides are decent with no exceptional flavors that would make us want to come back or recommend them

we are extremely satisfied with our decision to buy one of the 9stage systems available the reason behind our admiration is its exceptional ability to maintain optimal ph levels in our ro water additionally the prices for such topnotch equipment are the most reasonable we could come across moreover it brings us joy knowing that this product is produced in the us rather than in china

in case you havent guessed this nightclub in la is the epitome of snobby behavior unless you have the privilege of being on the coveted waitlist or fitting societal beauty standards dont even bother trying to enter essentially the normal line turns into a forced queue where everyone has to pay 50 per head or women can opt for a revealing outfit to increase their chances of getting selected resulting in predominantly men being excluded

while seafood isnt my cup of tea i decided to go for it on my husbands birthday since hes a big fan luckily there were nonseafood options available that truly pleased me and my husband couldnt stop raving about his excellent dish
the rolls are on the smaller side and choosing the seabass appetizer would be a better use of your money
among the options available the crab legs and shrimp were relatively satisfying yet not on par with the cosmopolitian
with the exception of neglecting to reinstall my antenna which has happened once their service is commendable as they manage to finish the task swiftly in just 20 minutes
dont bother with the small rolls theyre not worth it choose the seabass appetizer instead

our purchase of a 9stage system has been a great success we are highly pleased with how it effectively balances the ph levels in our ro water furthermore the prices for this highquality equipment are the most competitive we could find its also worth noting that this product is proudly made in the us which adds to its appeal as opposed to being manufactured in china
im not a fan of seafood but it was my husbands birthday and he adores it there were alternative choices besides seafood that brought me joy and my husband expressed his delight with his meal

having enjoyable times here is always a given

our experience was marred by the unfriendly behavior of one particular lady offering service and the restaurant only offered a few choices of meals the taste of the food left much to be desired and given the quality and service the price was far from worth it nonetheless i can say that i was pleased with how clean everything was
among the selection one of the more enjoyable options was the crab legs and shrimp although they were not as impressive as the cosmopolitian
if youre looking for something substantial skip the small rolls and try the seabass appetizer instead

with a menu boasting delectable food options one would expect higher prices than their usual average of 25 per person for dinner regrettably their understanding of customer service and efficiency is seriously lacking its almost routine to have to ask for drink refills napkins and even your bill astonishingly the individual at the register went as far as questioning me about not tipping completely disregarding the fact that they provided no service worth acknowledging

the preference for dryaged meats doesnt resonate with us since they often come across as spoiled in taste nevertheless the accompanying side dishes are decent without any noteworthy elements that would make us exceptionally enthusiastic or compel us to revisit

the staff provided very amiable service and we were pleasantly surprised by how tasty the food was we opted for the gyro and thought it was on par with any other place even though we arrived 5 minutes before closing the food remained fresh and did not have a stale taste the only problem we encountered was the absence of any greens in the wrap without a doubt i would eat here again

what a great place its off strip location but highly recommend this place if you are looking for a nice izakaya type of place at reasonable pricensashimi salad sea food chawanmushi enoki mushrooms and the home made tofu were incredibly good

im amazed by the new address at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc where you can find over 15 different varieties of chicken salad and delicious desserts such as hummingbird cake and cocacola cake its like homemade food and even featured on the popular food network for their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll the prices are also very reasonable

this variety of asian food can be described as decent with salty flavors and cannedtasting sauces and meat it is comparable in quality to frozen dinners from the grocery store but it comes at a higher cost

the bagels here are satisfactory however its the delightful beverages that steal the show my taste buds are especially fond of their blackberry lemonade as for the ambiance it may come across as lacking character yet it compensates with a refreshing airconditioned environment and impeccably maintained restrooms considering its location on state street this is quite impressive
in brief this asian cuisine option offers a salty taste reminiscent of canned sauces and meat it is on par with frozen meals available at supermarkets although it comes with a higher price tag
the experience is satisfactory but not exceptional there isnt a wide variety of seafood options available making it quite similar to the other asian buffets in town

their food is of exceptional quality with dinner prices averaging about 25 per person however their understanding of customer service and efficiency is severely lacking it is common to have to ask for drink refills napkins and even your bill shockingly the individual at the register questioned why i did not leave a tip despite the lack of service received

the beds were incredibly comfortable and the location couldnt have been better we appreciated having free wifi parking and a 247 pool and hot tub when we accidentally left a cell phone in our room the attentive housekeepingsecurity team found it for us this experience makes us want to come back again
absolutely spectacular  spinning flat screen tv best pool scene in vegas  hottest clubs  from start to finish this was an amazing ultra casino  as the name encore suggestsi would do it again

prepare to be wowed by the newly opened restaurant situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc this exciting place offers an impressive range of choices with over 15 mouthwatering variations of chicken salad waiting to tempt your taste buds you can extend your culinary adventure and satisfy your sweet tooth by trying their irresistible desserts which include classics like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake each bite will transport you back to the comforting flavors our mothers lovingly created this unique eatery has even gained nationwide fame thanks to its feature on the illustrious food network highlighting their worldfamous buttered and grilled chicken served on a new england roll moreover youll appreciate their excellent pricing making it accessible for everyone to enjoy these remarkable treats

get ready to be wowed by the brandnew establishment situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc this exciting place boasts an impressive range of choices with over 15 mouthwatering variations of chicken salad awaiting you extend your culinary adventure and satisfy your sweet tooth by trying their irresistible desserts which include classics like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake—each bite transportingly reminiscent of the comforting flavors our mothers used to lovingly create this unique eatery has even gained nationwide fame owing to its feature on the illustrious food network highlighting their worldfamous buttered and grilled chicken served on a new england roll moreover youll appreciate their excellent pricing making it accessible for everyone to enjoy these remarkable treats

youll be blown away by the amazing vegetarian dishes especially the delectable spicy po boy and the irresistible chili fries

gathering at this spot is a customary choice for my family despite the fact that i have not discovered a single meal that truly delighted me here although the help was satisfactory i consistently leave with a sense of dissatisfaction
